title: MonkeGodz
description: 333 supply programmatically generated pixel gods NFT collection that will be released on NEAR. Each MonkeGodz holder will be able to cast a vote on the DeityDao, which will pave the way for the project's future!

hero.title: Be a part of the Godz
hero.body: 333 supply programmatically generated pixel gods NFT collection that will be released on NEAR. Each MonkeGodz holder will be able to cast a vote on the DeityDao, which will pave the way for the project's future!

signedIn.ps:

Get in on the pre-mint! [Join our Discord](https://discord.gg/qS9CDRWYSa) and request an invite.

saleOpen.ps: Blessed thou art, young monke. Art thou ready for divinity?

allSold.title: All INITIAL_COUNT minted!
allSold.body: The MonkeGodz have all been created
